title: Tobacco Pouch, 1815–40
medium:
Medium: cotton, glass and ceramic beads, doe skin
Technique: knitted with beads
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Pouch of finely knitted green cotton with a drawstring at the top and tassel at the bottom. Geometric designs in white beadwork at top and bottom, middle section has vertical stripes of polychrome beads on a brown ground. Lined with doeskin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tobacco Pouch, 1815–40.
1815–40. Medium: cotton, glass and ceramic beads, doe skin
Technique: knitted with beads. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-14.
